attributes.action: Change The Policy Within Pubs And Clubs For Entry To Minimise Underage People, Rather Than Rise The Legal Drinking Age To 21.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Are you against the legal drinking age being rised to 21?

Do you have friends who are between 18-20 who you enjoy socialising with? 

Are you currently between the ages 18-20 or soon to be turning the ages?

Or do you think Pubs and Clubs should change the policy and become more strict to reduce the entry of underage people?

Then Sign the petition to state your against this outraging idea! 

Why should those who are old enough to go out with friends and enjoy their free time be punished because of those risking it?!

SIGN TODAY TO STOP THIS FROM HAPPENING!!
